text: Hanks Anuku (born 27 August 1960) is a Nigerian-Ghanaian actor. He often stars as a villain in many Nollywood films.http://www.vanguardngr.com/2011/06/hanks-anuku- transforms/https://www.imdb.com/name/nm2116371/ As of 2017, Anuku was naturalized and became an American. ==Early life== He attended Loyola College, Ibadan. He graduated from Auchi Polytechnic in 1981,modern ghana retrieved 13 March 2015 and he was born 1960 in Ibadan. ==Filmography== *Broad Daylight (2001) *Bitter Honey (2005) *The Captor (2006) *Men on Hard Way (2007) *Fools on the Run(2007) *Desperate Ambition(2006) *My Love *Wanted Alive *Rambo ==References== Category:21st-century Nigerian male actors Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Male actors from Ibadan Category:21st- century Ghanaian male actors Category:Auchi Polytechnic alumni Category:Ghanaian people of Nigerian descent Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States his currently staying in South Africa
title: Hanks Anuku
